name: Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Popcorn
description: Elevate your snacking experience with our Truffle-Infused Sea Salt Popcorn, crafted for gourmet enthusiasts. Each fluffy kernel is air-popped and lightly coated in aromatic truffle oil, then finished with a sprinkle of hand-harvested sea salt. The result is a rich, earthy flavor balanced perfectly with a hint of oceanic freshness. Ideal for movie nights, elegant gatherings, or as a luxurious treat on the go. Made with non-GMO corn and no artificial flavors, it’s a sophisticated snack you can feel good about.

attributes.ingredients: Non-GMO corn, truffle oil, sea salt, sunflower oil
